<<<<<<< HEAD
Reasons for which the service booke, urged upon Scotland ought to bee refused Gillespie, George, 1613-1648, attributed name.
[4] p.
Printed [by G. Anderson], [[Edinburgh] : in the year of God. 1638]
Sometimes attributed to George Gillespie. Caption title. Place of publication and printer's name from STC; publication date from colophon. Signatures: A² . This edition has A1r catchword: English. Probably intended to be issued with STC 22026, but often found bound with STC 22030, 22056, and other items (STC). Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
=======

Sometimes attributed to George Gillespie. Caption title. Place of publication and printer's name from STC; publication date from colophon. Signatures: A² . This edition has A1r catchword: English. Probably intended to be issued with STC 22026, but often found bound with STC 22030, 22056, and other items (STC). Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
G. Anderson]
